name: Void 21
description: Void 21 is a procedurally generated, arcade style, fast-paced runner and shooter. You are a pilot training with the highly maneuverable and lethal Void ship. Your objective is to reach the end of the level, either as quickly or as violently as possible (or both?).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.00 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Specifications above allow for smooth gameplay @ 720p60fps

reviews.review_text: Its a nice game to kickback, relax, and repeatedly smash into walls.
Very fast paced, reminds me a lot of Race The Sun. The first few levels might be easy, but it ramps up in the difficulty pretty quickly.

Fast and fun racer. Graphics are simple but they work. Challenging without being frustrating. Played on mouse and keyboard and felt that the controls were nice and responsive. Pretty good replay value, though it's missing that little addictive spark that keeps me coming back to games like this.  All of that said it's the kind of game where you stop playing and don't really feel the need to come back it. It's actually a game that I wouldn't mind having on my mobile phone because of the pickup and play nature but I don't think it really provides enough value for the price.
